channel.title: Being Banned
channel.description:
Oh I Just wanna specify that ANYONE can get back on the forums if their ipbanned from here for ever, or for a short time. and enough to make a new account and start posting again lol...
They should make it better, because apparently it doesn't work...lmao.

item.title: Being Banned
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

We can actually ban whole ISP’s and I believe mopar is working on something so proxy’s can’t access the forum.

Read full topic

I dunt gt it?

item.title: Being Banned
item.dc:creator: @Stroud Stroud
item.description:
@Stroud wrote:

Hehe…If you’re banned, you got banned for being stupid…Why curse us moparisthebest users with your stupid posts of “i liek aplpes and haha joo guyz r st00pid cuz yoo didtn actually ban meh!!!111!!!1eleven!!!11!!” seriously none of us cares. If you wanna be an ass and re-join, it is against our code of conduct, our rules, and you lawfully agreed to it when you made your account by clicking “i agree” don’t be an ass dude, just leave.

Read full topic

item.title: Being Banned
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well there is a list of proxies that is banned, but it’s impossible to get them all.

If it was a real problem, we could ban your IP range. But there’s obviously not a whole lot we can do. I mean for most people if they lose an account that they spent hours and hours posting on it discourages them and they leave the forums.

But if you evaded your ban, you know it’s against the rules and you’ll probably just get banned again for admitting it. Obviously that doesn’t matter very much to you though. Hate to break it to you, but your not a 1337 h4x0r just for getting back onto the forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Being Banned
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Not if you are IP banned you can’t, unless you have the kind of IP that always changes. (Can’t remember name.)

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Ip banning never works, there is never a way to keep someone off a website… and this is old news.

Read full topic
